alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fountain; Montgomery; Parke; Putnam (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 6:14AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Fountain, north central Clay, eastern Parke, southwestern Montgomery and western Putnam Counties through 645 AM EDT... At 614 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Veedersburg to 8 miles north of Brazil. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Fountain, north central Clay, eastern Parke, southwestern Montgomery and western Putnam Counties, including the following locations... Bridgeton, Reelsville, Waveland, Lena, New Market, Cecil Harden Lake, Shades State Park, Russellville, Carbon and Alamo. This includes Interstate 70 near mile marker 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
